text: Markus Thomas Theodor Söder (born 5 January 1967) is a German politician. In 2018, he became Minister President of Bavaria. In 2019, he became Leader of the Christian Social Union in Bavaria (CSU).Joern Poltz (19 January 2019), Leader of Bavarian CSU promises new start with Merkel's party Reuters. ==References== ==Other websites== *Markus Söder at the Landtag of Bavaria Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians of the Christian Social Union of Bavaria
title: Markus Söder
